title: From hard refusals to safe-completions: toward output-centric safety training
raw_excerpt: Discover how OpenAI's new safe-completions approach in GPT-5 improves both safety and helpfulness in AI responses—moving beyond hard refusals to nuanced, output-centric safety training for handling dual-use prompts.
raw_body: Discover how OpenAI's new safe-completions approach in GPT-5 improves both safety and helpfulness in AI responses—moving beyond hard refusals to nuanced, output-centric safety training for handling dual-use prompts.
speedrun: OpenAI's GPT-5 introduces a safe-completions approach for better AI safety and helpfulness.
why_it_matters: Enhances AI's ability to handle sensitive prompts.
Reduces hard refusals, improving user experience.

lenses.eli12: OpenAI's GPT-5 is better at answering questions safely. It learns to respond carefully to tricky topics.
lenses.pm: Users benefit from more helpful AI responses. The market may see increased trust in AI, but risks include potential misuse of nuanced responses.
lenses.engineer: The method focuses on output-centric safety training using dual-use prompts. Constraints include ensuring responses remain safe while being helpful.
